product_name: Timex Expedition Fastwrap Digital Watch - Women's
long_description: The women's Timex Expedition Fastwrap Digital Watch offers the performance of a chrono alarm timer with digital functionality and a durable design for everyday use. INDIGLO night light. Durable and lightweight resin case; Fast Wrap(R) rip-and-stick strap. The Timex Expedition Fastwrap Digital Watch is water-resistant to 100m (330m).
short_description: The women's Timex Expedition Fastwrap Digital Watch offers the performance of a chrono alarm timer with digital functionality and a durable design for everyday use.
